channel.title: GUI on IT技术分享
channel.description: Recent content in GUI on IT技术分享

item.title: GUI,CLI,TUI
item.description: CLI – Typing commands and editing files manually, fun, thought-provoking and often leads to troubleshooting TUI – Characterized by the /sbin/yast text-based UI, often using the NCurses library, it’s a text version of a GUI, as it were, and YaST in the TUI mode matches screen for screen with the GUI mode GUI – Characterized by the /sbin/yast2 X11 GUI interface, it’s run in
